description: Schema for image sprite generation files

customstyles.description: Define custom CSS declarations to inject into the generated stylesheet.

dpi.description: The image resolution of the generated image sprite

images.description: An array of file paths relative to this document. The name must be unique.

additionalProperties.description: A source image for the sprite.

optimize.description: Optimizes the generated image either lossy or lossless. Requires the "Image Optimizer" extension for Visual Studio

orientation.description: The orientation of the individual images inside the generated sprite.

output.description: Output format of the generated image sprite.

padding.description: The padding arround each individual image in the sprite. The value is in pixels.

pathprefix.description: Add any path root in front of the generated. Example: "/images/"

stylesheet.description: Define stylesheets (css, less, sass) to be generated as part of the sprite generation process.
